#summary PIE Function : Functions

= PIE Function : Functions=

Functions allow you assign a name to a block of code an reuse it elsewhere. 

Functions are organised into tabs like a web browser along the top of the IDE. To switch between functions click on on a tab.

=== Create a new Function ===

To create a new function press the + button in the IDE and type in a name.

<insert screenshot<<

You can now type any code you want into the function

=== Use a Function ===

To use a function after it has been created type run followed by the function name.

<font color = "blue">run</font> function1

=== Delete a Function ===

To delete a function first select the tab you want to delete then press the red <font color = "red">-</font> button on the IDE.
